fail_list_projects: Failed to load the list of projects.
class_rule_description: No spaces are allowed in the name. Each word in the name should start with a capital letter.
FAILED_TO_CREATE_PROJECT: Failed to create a new project.
NAME: Name
CREATE_PROJECT_TO_START: Please create a new project to get started.
MODULE_NOT_FOUND_FOR_COPYING: Original module not found for copying
INVALID_CLASS_NAME: {{className}} is not a valid name. Please enter a different name.
CLASS_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: Another Mechanism or OpMode is already named {{name}}. Please enter a different name.
PYTHON_MODULE_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: {{name}} is not a valid name because there is a python module named {{moduleName}}.

THEME_MODAL.LIGHT_DESCRIPTION: Clean and bright interface for daytime use
THEME_MODAL.DARK_DESCRIPTION: Easy on the eyes for low-light environments
THEME_MODAL.TRITANOPIA_DESCRIPTION: Designed for those with Tritanopia color blindness
THEME_MODAL.TRITANOPIA_DARK_DESCRIPTION: Dark theme for those with Tritanopia color blindness
THEME_MODAL.DEUTERANOPIA_DESCRIPTION: Designed for those with Deuteranopia color blindness
THEME_MODAL.DEUTERANOPIA_DARK_DESCRIPTION: Dark theme for those with Deuteranopia color blindness
THEME_MODAL.CHOOSE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a theme that best suits your preference and working environment.
THEME_MODAL.PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION: The selected theme will be applied to the entire application interface.

BLOCKLY.PARAMETERS_CAN_ONLY_GO_IN_THEIR_METHODS_: Parameters can only go in their method's block
BLOCKLY.JUMP_CAN_ONLY_GO_IN_THEIR_STEPS_BLOCK: Jump can only go in their step's block
BLOCKLY.CLASS_METHOD_DEF_ALREADY_ON_WORKSPACE: This method is already on the workspace.
BLOCKLY.EVENT_HANDLER_ALREADY_ON_WORKSPACE: This event handler is already on the workspace.
BLOCKLY.EVENT_HANDLER_ROBOT_EVENT_NOT_FOUND: This block is an event handler for an event that no longer exists.
BLOCKLY.EVENT_HANDLER_MECHANISM_EVENT_NOT_FOUND: This block is an event handler for an event that no longer exists.
BLOCKLY.EVENT_HANDLER_MECHANISM_NOT_FOUND: This block is an event handler for an event in a mechanism that no longer exists.

TOOLTIP.EVALUATE_BUT_IGNORE_RESULT: Executes the connected block and ignores the result.  Allows you to call a function and ignore the return value.
TOOLTIP.OPMODE_TYPE: What sort of OpMode this is
TOOLTIP.OPMODE_ENABLED: Whether the OpMode is shown on Driver Station
TOOLTIP.OPMODE_NAME: The name shown on the Driver Station.  If blank will use the class name.
TOOLTIP.OPMODE_GROUP: An optional group to group OpModes on Driver Station
TOOLTIP.COMPONENTS: These components are visible in this mechanism, the robot, and all opmodes.
TOOLTIP.PRIVATE_COMPONENTS: These components will not be visible in the robot or opmodes. They are only accessible within this mechanism.
TOOLTIP.CALL_CONSTRUCTOR: Constructs an instance of the class {{className}}.
TOOLTIP.CALL_MECHANISM_COMPONENT_INSTANCE_METHOD: Calls the instance method {{className}}.{{functionName}} on the component named {{componentName}} in the mechanism named {{mechanismName}}.
TOOLTIP.CALL_COMPONENT_INSTANCE_METHOD: Calls the instance method {{className}}.{{functionName}} on the component named {{componentName}}.
TOOLTIP.CALL_MECHANISM_INSTANCE_METHOD: Calls the instance method {{className}}.{{functionName}} on the mechanism named {{mechanismName}}.
TOOLTIP.GET_INSTANCE_VARIABLE: Gets the variable {{varName}} for the given {{className}} object.
TOOLTIP.SET_INSTANCE_VARIABLE: Sets the variable {{varName}} for the given {{className}} object.

WARNING.CALL_INSTANCE_WITHIN_METHOD_MISSING_METH: This block calls a method that does not exist in this module.
WARNING.CALL_COMPONENT_INSTANCE_METHOD_PRIVATE_C: This blocks calls a method on a private component in the {{mechanismClassName}} mechanism.
WARNING.CALL_COMPONENT_INSTANCE_METHOD_MISSING_C: This block calls a method on a component that no longer exists.
WARNING.CALL_MECHANISM_COMPONENT_INSTANCE_METHOD: This block calls a method on a component that belongs to a mechanism that no longer exists.
WARNING.CALL_ROBOT_INSTANCE_METHOD_INSIDE_MECHAN: This block is not allowed to be used inside a mechanism.
WARNING.CALL_ROBOT_INSTANCE_METHOD_MISSING_METHO: This block calls a method that no longer exists in the robot.
WARNING.CALL_MECHANISM_INSTANCE_METHOD_INSIDE_ME: This block is not allowed to be used inside a mechanism.
WARNING.CALL_MECHANISM_INSTANCE_METHOD_MISSING_M: This block calls a method that no longer exists in the mechanism.
This block calls a method in a mechanism that no longer exists.
WARNING.EVENT_NOT_IN_HOLDER: This block can only go in the events section of the robot or mechanism.
WARNING.COMPONENT_NOT_IN_HOLDER: This block can only go in the components section of the robot or mechanism.
WARNING.MECHANISM_NOT_IN_HOLDER: This block can only go in the mechanisms section of the robot.
WARNING.OPMODE_STEPS_OR_PERIODIC_REQUIRED: A PeriodicOpMode should have steps, the periodic method, or both.
WARNING.MECHANISM_NOT_FOUND: This block refers to a mechanism that no longer exists.
